subject: Automobile Racing
Marijuana
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A grand jury in Ontario County, N.Y., did not indict Stewart, a Nascar champion, in the racetrack death after hearing from more than two dozen witnesses.
snippet: A grand jury in Ontario County, N.Y., did not indict Stewart, a Nascar champion, in the racetrack death after hearing from more than two dozen witnesses.
